Maurice Marie Jean Pon (26 October 1921 in Bordeaux – 3 April 2019) was a French lyricist who mainly worked with Henri Salvador.Obituary on Le Monde In 1949, Pon wrote the lyrics of "Le Loup, la Biche et le Chevalier". With Salvador, Pon also wrote "" and other well-known French songs. He also wrote for Bourvil, Fernandel, Jean Sablon, André Claveau and Les Frères Jacques. Pon died in Île-de-France, at the age of 97.Obituary on Le Figaro (4 April 2019) == Bibliography == * Maurice Pon, Ma Chanson douce avec Henri Salvador.
